detailsData.title: Cost-Effective Litigation
detailsData.content: The Killian Firm, P.C. is an AV-rated® law firm focusing on insurance coverage litigation, employment litigation, and commercial litigation. We're working hard to cure clients of the notion that bigger is always better.

detailsData.title: Insurance Coverage Expertise
detailsData.content: TKF represents policyholders against insurance companies in a wide variety of coverage matters, both first-party and third-party. You can read more about our services on our blog.

detailsData.title: Employment Law Guidance
detailsData.content: TKF counsels management on the best practices for minimizing employment law disputes under New Jersey and federal law. We also defend employment litigation cases.

detailsData.title: Commercial Dispute Resolution
detailsData.content: TKF represents companies and executives in a wide variety of disputes relating to commercial contracts, from lending agreements to partnership agreements. Our goal is to achieve favorable outcomes efficiently.

address: 107 Tindall Road, Tindall Executive Centers, Middletown, NJ 07748
valueProp: The Killian Firm, P.C. is an AV-rated® law firm focusing on insurance coverage litigation, employment litigation, and commercial litigation. We're working hard to cure clients of the notion that bigger is always better.
